import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import './spiritDataActions.css' const MatchDataAdd = () => { const [art_name, set_art_name] = useState('') const [art_type, set_art_type] = useState('') const [location, set_location] = useState('') const [date, set_date] = useState('') const [day, set_day] = useState('') const [time, set_time] = useState('') const navigate = useNavigate() const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { await axios.post('http://localhost:8000/api/contests', { art_name, art_type, location, date, day, time }) navigate('/admin/contest') } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } return (

TAMBAH KONTES

set_art_name(e.target.value)} placeholder='Nama Kontes' />
set_art_type(e.target.value)} placeholder='Departemen 1' />
set_location(e.target.value)} placeholder='Lokasi' />
set_date(e.target.value)} placeholder='Tanggal' />
set_day(e.target.value)} placeholder='Hari' />
set_time(e.target.value)} placeholder='Time' />
) } export default MatchDataAdd
